name: unrecognizably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is difficult to recognize: My home town has now changed almost unrecognizably. Today things are unrecognisably different. Related word
unrecognizableOpposite
recognizably
More examplesFewer examplesHe described how the sport had changed unrecognisably in that period.Any impartial onlooker would say that teaching, lessons and schools are almost unrecognizably better than a decade ago. They are trying to figure out how to make money in a business environment that has changed almost unrecognizably since the paper was launched.
